replies.body: I'm dissapointed that they are removing bans from ARAM. and leaving in the whole minion thing, i want to fight the enemy champs not minions and iv never played ARAM and thought this is taking too long {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}

The ban system doesnt do anything, there is too many champs to ban all the op ones, and theres people like me who ban out the crap champs to welcome all the op/fun champs. decreasing game time is also a big bonus because i would just play a normal game if id known my aram games were gonna last the same time. Aram is meant to be a short minigame

I enjoyed banning that champ that I just cbf with VSing or playing that game tho. Didn’t have to be an OP one. And they making blitz for short games don’t need two blitz type modes. I only play ARAM, so if the games going forward are like how they’ve been I can see myself playing LoL less and less

What is the logic of nerfing zed when at the end of the article he got a boost of +5 Damage dealt

Will keep banning him everytime, he is so overpower.
This +5% damage adjustment is specifically for ARAM.
Adding straight damage dealt increases and damage received increases seems way too BS for SR so I am guessing it's ARAM also due to the fact it's under the ARAM Banner in the patch notes.
Correct, that buff is only for ARAM.
When will these skins release?
Usually, a week or so after the patch goes live, but it varies. But guaranteed during this patch cycle unless something breaks quite badly.
so can anyone tell me when i can actually BUY the IG skins. like zed is out but still no date for any of the team skins.
Probably in like 2 or 3 days. These skins usually release a week after the announcement
As if Yi needed a buff
You gave those IG skins the wrong shoes lul
Disappointing that aram still inst Random champs. ARAM needs all champs unlocked so many aram only accounts ???? Riot Thoughts???
Ahh yes my fav couple Kai and rakan
Man im so glad Renekton got that buff. Not like he already healed half is health every 8 seconds whenever his Q was off cooldown. Now he can heal ALL his health every 8 seconds.
Kinda need to buff ivern in aram, he has no passive.

Anyone else getting amazing LP LOSSES and tiny LP gains? I was getting +22s and -16ss in Plat 2. Now im getting -23s and +15s. Really strange considering I had great mmr and was on a win streak..... I was playing against Diamond 4/3s as a Plat 2. Someone explain pls? Otherwise I'm done for ranked....
Me too. This system is weird.
Waiting on my Karma{{champion:43}} skin...
buff shaco
